    • Constructor Detail

      • Observation

        public Observation(int itype,
           int id,
           Vector2d pos,
           Vector2d posReference,
           int category)
        New observation. It is the observation of a sprite, recording its ID and position.
        Parameters:
        itype - type of the sprite of this observation
        id - ID of the observation.
        pos - position of the sprite.
        posReference - reference to compare this position to others.
        category - category of this observation (NPC, static, resource, etc.)

    • Method Detail

          int id,
          Vector2d pos,
          Vector2d posReference,
          int category)
        Updates this observation
        Parameters:
        itype - type of the sprite of this observation
        id - ID of the observation.
        pos - position of the sprite.
        posReference - reference to compare this position to others.
        category - category of this observation (NPC, static, resource, etc.)

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Observation o)
        Compares this observation to others, using distances to the reference position.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Observation>
        Parameters:
        o - other observation.
        Returns:
        -1 if this precedes o, 1 if same distance or o is closer to reference.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object other)
        Compares two Observations to check if they are equal. The reference attribute is NOT compared in this object.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        other - the other observation.
        Returns:
        true if both objects are the same Observation.
